Class HDBManager

java.lang.Object
User
HDBManager
public class HDBManager extends User
Represents an HDB Manager in the BTO booking system.

This class extends User and manages multiple Project instances. Each HDB Manager can handle only one active project at a time and can generate reports on successful applicants using customizable filters.

    • HDBManager

      public HDBManager(String nric, String pwd, String role, HashMap<String, List<String>> correct_map)
      Constructs a new HDBManager object using data from the provided user data map.
      Parameters:
      nric - the NRIC of the manager
      pwd - the password of the manager
      role - the role (should be "hdbmanager")
      correct_map - the HashMap containing NRIC keys mapped to user details

    • generate_report

      public void generate_report(Filter filter)
      Generates and prints a report of successful applicants from all managed projects. The report output is filtered according to the conditions specified in the given Filter.

      The report can include filters for age range, marital status, flat type, and can selectively display various details like project name, flat type, age, and marital status.

      Parameters:
      filter - a Filter object specifying which applicants to include and what information to display
